clickhouse.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test_ascii_data ( id UInt32, ascii_string String, mixed_string String, long_string String, empty_string String ) ENGINE = Memory
clickhouse.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_ascii_data SELECT number as id, repeat('A', 100) as ascii_string, repeat('Hello World!', 50) as mixed_string, repeat('Pure ASCII 123 !@#', 30) as long_string, '' as empty_string FROM numbers(1000000)
clickhouse.query: SELECT isValidASCII(ascii_string) FROM test_ascii_data FORMAT Null
SELECT isValidASCII(mixed_string) FROM test_ascii_data FORMAT Null
SELECT isValidASCII(long_string) FROM test_ascii_data FORMAT Null
SELECT isValidASCII(empty_string) FROM test_ascii_data FORMAT Null
SELECT isValidASCII('Mixed\x80Content') FROM test_ascii_data LIMIT 1000000 FORMAT Null
